question: Create a Mask Armature
options: To create the base of your mask use chicken wire to form the shape. Lay your mask outline on top of the mesh so it is parallel to the grain of the mesh, and use a sharpie to trace around the outline. Cut the shape out. Carefully shape the mask, adding curves to the edges where you want them. To shape the mask to your face, hold the mesh in front of your face with your index fingers right over the eyes. Press the mesh onto your face, making indentations where your eyes are, moulding over the ridge of your nose, and curving around your forehead and cheeks.

To create the base of your mask use sculpting mesh to form the shape. Lay your mask outline on top of the mesh so it is parallel to the grain of the mesh, and use a sharpie to trace around the outline. Cut the shape out. Press the mesh onto your face, making indentations where your eyes are, moulding over the ridge of your nose, and curving around your forehead and cheeks.

question: How can I blow up my air mattress with a shop vac?
options: If you don’t have an air compressor to inflate your air mattresses or pool toys, you can use your shop vacuum instead, just pop the top off of a plastic squeeze bottle and fit the top to your vacuum’s hose. You may have to use duct tape. Once the top is secured to the hose, attach the hose to your vacuum’s exhaust port. It’ll blow up your inflatables in no time. To deflate, attach the hose to the vacuum port and suck the air out.

question: how to make spiced rum balls
options: Mix 3 3/4 cups crushed vanilla wafer cookies, 1 1/2 cups confectioners’ sugar, 3/4 teaspoon each nutmeg and cinnamon, and 1/2 teaspoon ground ginger. question: How to make sure all the clocks in the house are set accurately?
options: Get a solar clock for a reference and place it just outside a window that gets lots of sun. question: how to dry flowers
options: Find a dark, moist area with good circulation, such as an attic or unused closet. With unflavored dental floss, secure the bottom of the flowers' stems to a hanger so that they hang upside down to dry. Leave flowers for two to three weeks until completely dry.

question: Prepare a wall to have a frameless mirror attached
options: Mark the location for the lower edge of the mirror on the face of the wall. Position one edge of a 4-foot level at the mark and adjust the level, as necessary, so the bubble is centered between the bubble lines. Mark a line across the face of the wall.
